set.name: DMR-08S, DMD, DMX and Promos Episode 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and put a card from it on the bottom of his deck. Double breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Idol

property.name: Rules
Race
property.value: Human/Curry Bread/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may ask your opponent 'Do you love curry bread?'. If your opponent says 'Love', you may draw 2 cards. Otherwise, this creature gets +10000 power and breaks 2 additional shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your creatures in the battle zone that cost 3 or less get 'speed attacker'. Your opponent's evolution creatures and creatures that have 'speed attacker' are put into the battle zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets 'Speed attacker'. When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, if you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. Double breaker

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Magical Monster

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Evolution—Put on one of your water or fire creatures. Double breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever this creature attacks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Speed attacker Double breaker Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone for no cost, put that creature into its owner's mana zone. When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, shuffle this card and your graveyard into your deck instead.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Evolution—Put on one of your Hunters. While battling a light creature, this creature gets +2000 power. Whenever this creature wins a battle, untap this creature. Double breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Black Command Dragon/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can't attack creatures other than light creatures. Double breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Death Puppet/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, count the number of your Hunters in the battle zone. Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than that number.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Unknown

property.name: Rules
Race
property.value: Angel Command/Unnoise

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. It doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
Race
property.value: Cyber Lord/Unnoise

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution creature that has 'blocker' that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone .

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have 'blocker' from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge for each of your Dragons in the battle zone. Each time you win, destroy one of your opponent's commands or a creature that has power 7000 or less. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of his deck and then puts it on the bottom of his deck. If your revealed card costs the same as or greater than your opponent's revealed card, you win.) Speed attacker Double breaker

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Dragons. Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 12000 or less In Gachinko Judge, your revealed Dragon cards cost 8 more. Triple breaker

card.name: Kaiser Zack Storm, the Demon Eyed

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may put it into the battle zone instead. When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put any number of Hunters from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Double breaker

card.name: Daichino Kaiser, Mother Green Oni Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Green Command Dragon/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, you may choose a non-evolution Dragon in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put that creature into the battle zone Double breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Earth Dragon/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone Double breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Earth Dragon/Armored Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put this creature into your mana zone. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creature's that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a card that has Lupia in its name from your deck and put it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck. This creature has 'power attacker +1000' for each Fire Bird in your graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put all Dragons revealed this way into your mana zone tapped and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.value: King Command Dragon/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all non-Dragon creatures. Your opponent's Dragons can't attack. Triple breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Zombie Dragon/Unnoise

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose 2 from among them and put them into your graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a non-evolution Dragon, you may put it into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Each of your Dragons in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker' and 'slayer'. Double breaker

property.value: King Command Dragon/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all Dragons from your graveyard into your mana zone. During your turn, you may summon a Dragon from your mana zone. Double breaker

property.value: Armored Dragon/Unnoise

Rules
property.value: For each of your creatures that have both Unknown and Zenith races in the battle zone, you may have this spell cost 2 less to cast. It can't cost less than 1. Destroy all creatures except for Unknown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you tap a card in your mana zone, you may have that card's mana number become 2 or 3. Whenever you tap a card in your mana zone, put that card into your graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other creature in the battle zone gets -1000 power. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) When another creature is destroyed, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -1000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you don't have a shield, search your deck. You may take a (Victory) creature from your deck and show that creature to your opponent. If that creature can evolve from this creature, put it on top of this creature. Otherwise, add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Galaxy Vortex evolution—Choose 3 Dragons in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any non-evolution Dragons you reveal into the battle zone. Put the rest into your graveyard. Triple breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command/Unknown

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone, look at all your shields. You may choose a non-evolution Demon Command from among them and put it into the battle zone. Whenever your opponent casts a spell, look at all your shields. You may choose a spell from among them and cast it for no cost. Triple breaker
